LanguageData.InstallTacticalCorneaImplant.label: install tactical cornea implant
LanguageData.RemoveTacticalCorneaImplant.label: remove tactical cornea implant
LanguageData.RemoveTacticalCorneaImplant.description: Remove a tactical cornea implant. Due to the sophisticated nature of the implant, only a base portion of the implant (one MA-AI chip) can be salvaged upon removal.
